template.subject: Request: Television Coverage of Iran Humanitarian Crisis
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing to request that your network provide coverage of the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Iran.

Since December 28, 2025, peaceful protests across Iran have been met with a violent government crackdown:

• Over 51 protesters killed by security forces
• More than 2,270 detained, including journalists and activists
• A nationwide internet blackout preventing information flow
• Documented use of lethal force against unarmed civilians

Television news coverage reaches millions of viewers who may not otherwise learn about these events. Your platform has the power to:

1. Inform the American public about this human rights emergency
2. Give voice to Iranian protesters fighting for freedom
3. Encourage diplomatic and humanitarian responses
4. Document these events for historical record

I believe this story deserves prominent coverage. The Iranian people need the world to see what is happening.

Thank you for considering this important request.

Sincerely,
A concerned viewer from {{senderCountry}}

variations.subject: Iran Protests: A Story That Needs Television Coverage
variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am reaching out as a concerned citizen of {{senderCountry}} to request coverage of the crisis unfolding in Iran.

The facts are stark:
• 51+ killed in protests since December 28, 2025
• 2,270+ arbitrarily detained
• Complete internet shutdown to prevent documentation
• Security forces using live ammunition

As a major television network, you have the reach to inform millions about this situation. I urge you to dedicate airtime to this developing story.

The Iranian people are fighting for basic rights. Please help tell their story.

Respectfully,
A viewer who cares about human rights
